name: Someday(Unplugged)
content: You were so blind to let me go
你如此轻率地让我离开
You had it all but did not know
你早已拥有了一切却不自知
No one know find will never be
但你以后也不会发现有任何人
Closer to all your dreams than me
Believing the grass would be greener
总幻想有更好的人等着你
你告诉自己现在并不需要我
But I know you'll soon discover
但我相信你不久将发现
One you gave away will be
The only one you're wishing for
因为我才是那个最好的
你会回心转意唤我的名字
当你发现她们一个一个并无分别
And when you find yourself alone
因为我知道你很快就会发现
你需要的不是别人而是我
One you gave away will be
The only one you're wishing for
因为我才是那个最好的
One you gave away will be
The only one you're wishing for
因为我才是那个最好的
Maybe now you just can't conceive
也许现在你还无法想象
That there'll ever come a time
Baby  how could you ever believe
Might be coming back to own me
I won't need your love anymore
因为那时我再也不需要你的爱
One you gave away will be
The only one you're wishing for
总有一天 总有一天
因为我才是那个最好的
One you gave away will be
The only one you're wishing for
因为我才是那个最好的
One you gave away will be
The only one you're wishing for
因为我才是那个最好的
